name: EGFR
title: eGFR
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) test.),(Data Element Scope: OBSERVATION:),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) per 1.73 sq. M.
Note: This intentionally includes the discouraged code 33914-3 and deprecated code 97952-6 because these are still used at some practices for eGFR test results.),(Exclusion Criteria: eGFR values that are not corrected for body surface area.)
